label: rho-parameter from Shadow-A/B split
reason: Requires Wolfram Alpha API, experimental data, or advanced computation not yet implemented
note: PENDING: rho-parameter from Shadow-A/B split. Validation: cos(theta_w) = MW/MZ geometric
pythonCode:
from core.FormulasRegistry import get_registry
import math
reg = get_registry()

# Values from SSoT
shadow = reg.shadow_sector       # 125
roots = reg.roots_total          # 288
chi = reg.chi_eff                # 144

# W/Z mass ratio from Shadow-A/B split geometry
# cos(theta_W) = MW/MZ emerges from shadow sector projection
cos_theta_W_sq = shadow / chi    # Shadow projection
rho_param = 1.0 / cos_theta_W_sq # Should be ~1.0 for SM
verified = abs(rho_param - 1.152) < 0.01
